line.comment: * Returns [FALSE] if the favor already exists or if the user cancels, otherwise [TRUE].
* This script manages all parameters, including the cost.

line.text: 'You have an ongoing favor of this type with this faction. Time left: '
'You don't have enough favor points with this faction.'
'This faction has become too powerful and tyrannical. It will not help you.'
'This faction believes that it should be the sole protector for the galaxy.'
'This faction does not own an Advanced Satellite Factory and cannot explore for you.'
'You already know all the sectors they could show you.'
'Cannot sign a truce with a faction in total war.'
'Cannot sign a truce with an ally.'
'Cannot sign a truce with a faction in coalition.'
'Cannot sign a truce with a faction targetted by a coalition.'
'A truce has already been signed with this faction.'
'There already is a total war with this faction.'
'There already is an unbreakable alliance with this faction.'
'There already is a coalition with this faction.'
'There already is a coalition against this faction.'
'This sector has already been selected for another faction.'
'This sector cannot be claimed by this faction.'
